version_description:
В этом обновлении мы добавили историю поиска, а также увеличили скорость работы и улучшили дизайн.

p.s. Мы помним что вы просили добавить аукцион и доски объявлений... Скоро все будет :)
Hooray, now you can delete not interesting cars from history!

Opened verification by phone number!
Now you can check the seller for "outbid"

How?
Easy! We show a list of ads and cars in ads for the sale of which this number was indicated as a contact

started to implement a user profile. Now, directly from the application, you can communicate dreams by mail. all background information is already indicated in the template :)
Ideas and suggestions, mistakes or bugs - now it’s even easier to report them

Convenience for

Added a favorites list, and not only on the device!
Now you can not only save cars, but also view it on any device
the list is synchronized in the cloud with a link to your account

well, in the classics: fixed a couple of old bugs and added new ones
Please report them in the reviews inside the application.
On the categories screen, click on the profile in the upper right and select send feedback.
So far, only by mail, we are thinking about introducing telegrams.

Also send your suggestions for improvements and innovations. The best will be encouraged by free reports.

Added a favorites list, and not only on the device!
Now you can not only save cars, but also view it on any device
the list is synchronized in the cloud with a link to your account

well, in the classics: fixed a couple of old bugs and added new ones
Please report them in the reviews inside the application.
On the categories screen, click on the profile in the upper right and select send feedback.
So far, only by mail, we are thinking about introducing telegrams.

Also send your suggestions for improvements and innovations. The best will be encouraged by free reports.

Super magician hyper feature

added the ability to view photos of the car not only on current numbers but also on all its past.

See which car was before (if there were changes). For example, before the car was red, it turned blue, her bumper has changed. And why? Or the owner’s fantasy or straightened after an accident
In this update, we've added iPad support and a hotfix for iOS 14 support.

updated the iPad version
redesigned the payment window for devices with a small diagonal
improved the overall smoothness of the application
removed unnecessary
